I was on beta blockers for about a year, learnt they can have bad side effects long term so stopped cold turkey. I normally have a bag of camomile tea in my pocket. That shit can bring me from nervous wreck to smooth chillaxer. Also when I feel an anxiety attack comming, I tell remind myself that I am aware of this bad energy, and that it will pass. Once your mind is at peace with the fact it happens, it becomes less and less frequent. If you're mind tried to fight it, it makes it worse and a panic attack can follow. I was anxious and depressed for about 4 years. These steps helped me soooo much, now I barely have depression or anxiety :)
